title: Does Givson gs1000 has a coarse and sharp voice? Is it a worth buy? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, it has. If you are a beginner then this guitar is not good for you. if you want a guitar then you should look for other options. Today, there are only two options that you get: Swan7 maven series acoustic guitarBelear vega series acoustic guitarThese are the best yet affordable guitar options that you can consider. These guitars are known for smooth tones and sound without a coarse and sharp voice.
